resources.string: Sigurdur storms in with a sailor\'s swagger, the scent of the sea clinging to him, tales of distant lands and ocean adventures etched into the lines of his weathered face. Bring me a drink that carries the essence of the sea, a taste that resonates with the salt-kissed air of the ocean.

string-array.name: player_sigurdur
string-array.item: A drink that carries the scent of the sea. May it offer a moment\'s respite from the vastness of the ocean.
Watch out, that drink might set sail on its own voyage.
A sailor seeking a drink that echoes the sea\'s depth. Maybe my company could add a different kind of adventure?
